website_summaries.verdict: Amazon's Twitch continues to reign as the platform for live streamers to broadcast their video game sessions, and many other works, to the web. For viewers, it's a vastly entertaining alternative to traditional streaming services like Netflix.
pros: Many user-friendly options for both viewers and streamers
Desktop, mobile, and set-top box apps
Free games and other bonus items for subscribers
Offers own software for broadcasting from PC
cons: No official Nintendo Switch or Roku app
A Twitch Prime subscription no longer removes ads across the board
